column2: Honu0613, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I was taken to the Emergency Room today with severe Abdominal pain and had no answers from the ER DR cause of my symptoms.  The only thing I think caused it was using cologne while taking this disulfiram tablet.Cologne as all of you know has alcohol as an ingredient.  I can be wrong, but someone please correct me if I am.Mahalo.Michael
